name: Fast Food vs Zombies
description:
=========================================================== About the game:

Fast Food vs Zombies is a fangame of a very famous game called Plants vs Zombies. Remember, the game isn't 100% done. If you find any bugs, then tell me about them in the comments section.

=========================================================== Story: 

You play as a new fast food restaurant worker, your  task is to  defend the restaurant against waves of zombies using chemically mutated food.

===========================================================
